package_json.name: @fuz.dev/fuz
package_json.description: design system for CSS, Svelte, and SvelteKit

pull_requests.title: add .unprose
pull_requests.body:
Trying to solve my biggest problem with `.prose`, that I sometimes want sections inside it to opt-out of the styles.

The thing I originally tried doesn't work though. Not sure I can accomplish what I want without some gross CSS. (adding more large+slow+duplicative selectors, bleh)

- see `/* allow nesting in .prose */`

package_json.name: @fuz.dev/fuz_template
package_json.description: a static web app and Node library template with TypeScript, Svelte, SvelteKit, Vite, esbuild, Fuz, and Gro

package_json.name: @grogarden/gro
package_json.description: task runner and toolkit extending SvelteKit

scripts.build: rm -rf .gro dist && svelte-package && chmod +x ./dist/gro.js && npm link -f

pull_requests.title: stop using the `deploy` branch in the main cwd for `gro deploy`
pull_requests.body:
vscode flips out regularly from the workspace-destructive `deploy` branch in `gro deploy`. This refactors the internals to use a non-destructive strategy, at the cost of inefficiency -- a `.git` directory for the `deploy` branch is now duplicated in a cache directory. A benefit is that you no longer see `deploy` in your root `.git` context.

- maybe `.gro/deploy`?
- `git clone -b deploy --single-branch git://github.com/grogarden/gro.git

pull_requests.title: add and integrate `gro changelog`
pull_requests.body: - [ ] map leading hashes to the PR, fallback to the hash link
